remarks: Lemma for ~ dia2dim .  Define a translation ` G ` whose trace is atom ` U ` .  Part of proof of Lemma M in [Crawley] p. 121 line 4. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dia2dimlem2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia2dimlem2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem2.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia2dimlem2.q $e |- Q = ( ( P .\/ U ) ./\ ( ( F ` P ) .\/ V ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.u $e |- ( ph -> ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.v $e |- ( ph -> ( V e. A /\ V .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.f $e |- ( ph -> ( F e. T /\ ( F ` P ) =/= P ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.rf $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) .<_ ( U .\/ V ) ) $.
dia2dimlem2.rv $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` F ) =/= V ) $.
dia2dimlem2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. T ) $.
dia2dimlem2.gv $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` P ) = Q ) $.
dia2dimlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( R ` G ) = U ) $.
